title: Readout of Jared Kushner and Jason Greenblatt’s Meeting with the Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
June 20, 2018
Senior Advisor Jared Kushner and Special Representative for International Negotiations Jason Greenblatt returned to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and met today with Crown Prince Mohammad Bin Salman Al Saud.  Building on previous conversations, they discussed increasing cooperation between the United States and Saudi Arabia, the need to facilitate humanitarian relief to Gaza, and the Trump Administration’s efforts to facilitate peace between the Israelis and Palestinians.
